Gingham is a medium-weight balanced plain-woven fabric made from dyed cotton or cotton-blend yarn. It is made of carded, medium or fine yarns, where the colouring is on the warp yarns and always along the grain (weft). When the weft yarns are dyed in the same colour, this is sometimes referred to as a "solid" or "pale" gingham. When the weft yarns are dyed a darker colour, this is referred to as a "plaid" gingham.
